title: My Friendâ€™s Mom, The Ideal MILF
description: The male lead, Lee Jungsoo (20), spent a lot of time at his friend's house ever since he was young. After having his sexual awakening at the start of high school, he began viewing his friend's mom sexually. Now, as an adult, he somehow ends up alone with her and crosses a line that should not be crossed.
author: Studio Moon
